articles.author: EMMA BURROWS AP european security correspondent
articles.title: Russia is trying to overwhelm Europe with its sabotage campaign, Western officials say - ABC News
articles.description: The Associated Press has documented 145 incidents in what Western officials say is a campaign of disruption across Europe masterminded by Russia since President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine in 2022
articles.content: In November, a train carrying almost 500 people came to a sudden halt in eastern Poland. A broken overhead line had smashed several windows, and the track ahead was damaged. Elsewhere on the line, ex… [+7879 chars]

articles.title: At high-stakes summit, EU leaders prepare to take unprecedented steps to help Ukraine - PBS
articles.description: At a summit starting on Thursday, many European Union leaders will press for tens of billions of euros in frozen Russian assets held in Europe to be used to meet Ukraine’s economic and military needs for the next two years.
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) European Union leaders are about to attempt something theyve never tried before. The chances of failure are significant. Their actions this week could set dangerous precedents and a wro… [+4095 chars]
